description: This Python script demonstrates how to use Pipedream MCP servers with Agno Agents, specifically for LinkedIn integration. It sets up an asynchronous agent that connects to the MCP server, runs a task, and handles exceptions.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent configured with a model and tools, capable of executing tasks asynchronously.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: Represents an OpenAI chat model used within the agent.

classes.name: MCPTools
classes.description: Provides tools to interact with MCP servers, supporting streaming and other operations.

methods.name: run_agent
methods.description: Asynchronous function that initializes an MCPTools instance, creates an Agent with a specific model, and executes a task while handling exceptions.
